Html:
If I press Enter to add a new row, I get a NullReferenceException with the stack trace below.  If I click outside of the DataGrid after completing the row, the new row is created, and the new item placeholder appears at the bottom.  Can anyone hazard a guess as to why the two are different?  Something in my code?  Or a bug?

here's the stack trace:

System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object.

I have a similar error when trying to scroll item into view, while DataGrid and the item itself are not NULL.

Very similar stack trace, so there must be something wrong with VirtualizingStackPanel.InsertContainer
